programme.title: Top Secret! - Superconfidencial, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: "Top Secret!" coloca a estrela do rock americano Nick Rivers contra o Alto Comando da Alemanha Oriental. uma corrida contra o tempo quando Nick se junta com Hillary Flammond para encontrar o pai dela.

programme.title: Timecop: O Guardio do Tempo, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Max Walker, um oficial de uma agncia de segurana que regula as viagens no tempo, deve lutar por sua vida contra um poltico sombrio que pretende mudar o passado para controlar o futuro.

programme.title: Chuva Negra, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: Nick Conklin e Charlie Vincent so dois detetives da polcia de Nova York que precisam escoltar um assassino at o Japo. Mas o preso escapa e, para captura-lo, eles acabam se envolvendo em uma guerra entre gangues rivais da mfia japonesa.

programme.title: A Fuga, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Para sair da priso, um criminoso pede a esposa para negociar sua liberdade com um chefe da mfia. Mas quando o plano d errado, o casal tenta fugir para o Mxico.

programme.title: Os Suspeitos, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Cinco criminosos de carreira so apanhados no enredo labirntico do filme que envolve um gnio do crime intrigante, raramente visto e quase lendrio chamado Keyser Soze.

programme.title: The Music of Silence, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: Um filme biogrfico sobre o tenor e msico italiano Andrea Bocelli. Apesar de ter nascido com um grave problema de viso que terminar em cegueira, Bocelli supera todos os tipos de obstculos, guiado por grandes ambies em relao sua paixo, a msica.

programme.title: Um Anjo em Nossas Vidas, (2020, Children)
programme.desc: Quando um criminoso insensvel e doente cruza o caminho de uma menina cheia de f, uma segunda chance surge para tocar o corao durante a temporada de festas.

programme.title: O Garoto de Ouro, (2012, Comedy)
programme.desc: Um ex-campeo de luta livre da NCAA est em liberdade condicional aps 10 anos de priso. Agora, para salvar a vida de um amigo, ele concorda em participar em combates extremos. No entanto, ele est sendo solicitado a fazer o impossvel: perder.

programme.title: Procura da Liberdade, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: Dois homens separados por 100 anos esto unidos em sua busca pela liberdade. Em 1856, um escravo, Samuel Woodward e sua famlia, escapam da Plantao Monroe perto de Richmond, Virgnia.

programme.title: Prova de Fogo, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: No trabalho o Capito Caleb vive pelo velho ditado dos bombeiros: Nunca deixe o seu companheiro para trs. Em casa, ele vive pelas prprias regras. Agora Caleb ter o seu trabalho mais rduo, resgatar o corao de sua esposa.

programme.title: Dreamgirls: Em Busca de um Sonho, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: Com performances espetaculares de um elenco de estrelas, Dreamgirls faz enorme sucesso com a histria incrvel de trs cantoras que aprendem que tudo possvel quando voc segue os seus sonhos.

programme.title: Grandes Olhos, (2015, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Pintora e defensora das causas feministas, a norte-americana Margaret Keane enfrenta um de seus maiores desafios ao levar ao tribunal o prprio marido. Em um perodo em que o reconhecimento de um trabalho feminino era difcil.

programme.title: Lute Por Sua Vida, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Um filme focado em um grupo de pessoas obcecadas por um livro de autoajuda. medida que o livro se torna mais popular, ele afeta uma estranha variedade de personagens. Suas vidas se cruzam, gerando mudanas que duraro para sempre.

programme.title: Em Busca de um Milagre, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: O mundo do doutor Luke Matthew desaba quando ele perde o amor de sua vida e se torna pai na mesma noite. Quando ele contrata Sage como a nova bab, os dois comeam a perceber que a melhor forma de remdio deixar ir.

programme.title: Choji and Naruto are craving Ichiraku's special ramen only to find out that they find the shop closed! Teuchi reveals that his daughter has been kidnapped by Ryonin, aka the Ninja Chefs, who is after his secret recipes!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Demon of the Ocean is wreaking havoc in the Land of the Sea. Anko leads a team consisting of Naruto, Ino, and Shino. It turns out Anko has an unexpected history with the Land of the Sea.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Unable to find Naruto, Anko meets with officials from the Land of the Sea. The ship carrying government funds that they were supposed to guard sets sail the next day!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: As soon as she awakens, Anko begins to remember Demon Island, a place once visited with her former sensei, Orochimaru. Anko reveals the truth behind the disappearances and the secret behind Isaribi's body.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Amachi and his gang begin their attack on the government ship. Naruto and the others escape from Demon Island, but the sight that greets them is the Land of the Sea fleet on the verge of annihilation.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Hidden Leaf ninja and Amachi battle it out at sea. With Naruto's help, Amachi is defeated, but then a monster appears. Naruto summons Gamabunta in order to defeat the monster.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kunijiro visits Tsunade and decides to have Naruto guide his boy through one day in the life of a ninja!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Kiba, and Hinata are searching for buried treasure at the request of Tsunade's friend Agari Kaisen. Thinking its an easy task since they have a map, Tsunade threatens to send them back to the Academy if they fail.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After escaping from the cave, Naruto and the others chase after the Kedouin in order to put a halt to their plot, but the Village Hidden in the Leaves is already under attack.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto discovers Jiraiya is up to no good. Jiraiya claims to be busy getting his manuscript ready before his deadline. Impatient and irritated, Naruto writes his own manuscript for Jiraiya!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Hidden Leaf Village receives a request from the Village Hidden in the Stars to guard a star. The star is actually a meteorite that fell 200 years ago and is said to possess mysterious powers.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and the others investigate the whereabouts of the stolen star. The team suspects that is an inside job because the ninja who took the star used the ninja art, Kujaku, from the Star Village.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.desc: The legendary live show from the Monty Python troupe. Performing many of their greatest sketches from Monty Python's Flying Circus and two Monty Python specials, Monty Python's Fliegender Zirkus, live from the Hollywood Bowl in 1980.

programme.title: Fiddler on the Roof, (1971, Musical)

programme.title: Heaven Can Wait, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Heaven Can Wait is a romantic fantasy about Joe Pendleton, a Los Angeles Rams quarterback who is accidentally summoned to Heaven by an overly zealous celestial escort.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's on to level three as Yugi and his friends are transported to a lava-covered wasteland. To make matters worse, Joey is possessed by an evil force, and destroying it may mean destroying Joey as well.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends are faced with an impossible task: locating a magical apple in a forest full of apple trees.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang stumbles upon a small kingdom dominated by a clan of fierce dragons known as The Fiendish Five. If they fail to slay these beasts, one of Yugi's friends must give up his soul!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends defeat the Fiendish Fiveor so they think. These ferocious dragons have merged together and are now more powerful than ever!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Although the gang has passed the five sacred trials, the most dangerous test is yet to come. Now Yugi must face the spirit of Alexander the Great in an all-out Capsule Monsters war with the ultimate stakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are unconscious, leaving him to defeat Alexander the Great on his own!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa found the Millennium Puzzle decades ago, but little is known about the terrors, traps, turmoil, and treachery he faced to find the ancient artifact! See how it all began as we learn how Grandpa unearthed the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The evil spirit within the Millennium Ring has reunited with Bakura, prepped with a new monster to create the ultimate Shadow Game. And his first target is Kaiba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends go to the dawn of the duel, to the place where it all began, to the land where the Pharaoh's mysteries lie: Egypt.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The past is quickly becoming perilous as the fearless bandit king Bakura has invaded the Pharaoh's palace to take down the keepers of the seven Millennium Items single-handedly!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Even with the potent power of Obelisk the Tormentor, the Pharaoh couldn't prevent the bandit Bakura from escaping. Everyone knows that thief will return for a rematch, so Seto has a plan to create a powerful army.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad vows to stop the bandit king Bakura's sneak attacks once and for all, but he may have made a promise he can't keep!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad, the first of the Pharaoh's guardians, has fallen. Even worse, the bandit king Bakura now has the Millennium Ring, making his Diabound even more unstoppable!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origins of the Millennium Items are revealed! Who forged these powerful artifacts, and why were they created? Though the Millennium Items are powerful, such power comes with a heavy price... a debt that may never be able to be repaid!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh calls forth the mighty Egyptian God Slifer the Sky Dragon to fight the bandit Bakura's Diabound, but when Diabound starts attacking the townspeople, the Pharaoh must protect them, even if it means sacrificing himself!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The bandit Bakura has stolen the Millennium Puzzle and sent the Pharaoh plummeting into the abyss. Now he's another step closer to obtaining all seven Millennium Items and resurrecting the malevolent Zorc, the greatest evil of all time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the Pharaoh are reunited, but the Pharaoh is powerless without the Millennium Puzzle! However, that won't stop the Pharaoh from a final showdown against the bandit king Bakura.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the showdown in the sands between the bandit Bakura and his ever-growing Diabound versus the Pharaoh, Mahad the Dark Magician, and the remaining guardians of the Pharaoh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the help of his father's spirit, the Pharaoh and his guardians defeated the bandit Bakura's Diabound and stopped the horrible Zorc from resurrecting... or did they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh's journey was more than a trip to the past, it's the greatest Shadow Game ever created. Yami Yugi and Yami Bakura's Shadow Game has already reached apocalyptic proportions, but it's only the beginning of cataclysmic events!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zorc's incredible shadow energies have resurrected the bandit Bakura and his Diabound. With a second chance at revenge, the bandit king has broken up the Pharaoh's team so that he can divide and conquer them one at a time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The hope of mankind rests on Yugi's shoulders as he arrives at the final temple chamber where the Pharaoh's name is located, but something unexpected is waiting for them - a sinister surprise that can cost them their lives!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After a nearly eternal slumber, the all-powerful Zorc has resurrected, plunging the world into darkness!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc. The Pharaoh desperately wants to summon the three Egyptian Gods, but he can't without his Millennium Puzzle!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Exodia the Forbidden One couldn't defeat Zorc! Exodia was able to buy enough time for the Pharaoh to get his Millennium Puzzle back-he can now summon the almighty Egyptian Gods! It's time for the Pharaoh's counterattack in the biggest brawl.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part III

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated. The Pharaoh is severely hurt and unable to stop Zorc from setting fire to the city, but our heroes aren't giving up. It's not double vision when Seto and Kaiba transcend time to confront Zorc.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part IV

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and Kaiba's combined strength couldn't defeat Zorc. Yugi must give the Pharaoh his name, but Yugi doesn't know how to read ancient Egyptian text. All bets are off in the final clash where Yugi must protect the past to save the future!
programme.sub-title: In the Name of the Pharaoh

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pharaoh Atem, Yugi, and friends have defeated the bandit Bakura and Zorc, but the final test still awaits! Yugi must duel Atem! As they set sail to the final dueling grounds, everyone realizes this may be the final night Yugi and Atem have together.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi defeats Atem, Yugi will prove he's ready to stand on his own, and Atem can join his friends in the world beyond. But Yugi and Atem will be separated forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods! What chance does Yugi have against these powerful creatures that no one has been able to defeat? Yugi better think of a strategy quickly or this duel will be over soon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem still has all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn't have a single monster on the field! Yugi claims that he has a combo that will defeat the Egyptian Gods, but is he simply bragging, or does he actually have a plan?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem - more than friends, closer than brothers. Will they stay together, or is it time to say goodbye? It's the final answer, the final duel, and the final time we will see our friends in the rousing conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When the #1 ranked duelist and ruthless tycoon, Seto Kaiba, kidnaps Yugi's Grandpa to get the rare Blue-Eyes White Dragon card, Yugi must face Kaiba in the ultimate Duel Monsters showdown!

programme.title: More of the dramatic happenings on Zou are revealed as we learn that Jack's pirate band were not the only visitors to the elephant island! And what about the mysterious fate of Sanji?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Delinquent Comes Home! Emperor Big Mom's Assassins!

programme.title: The mystery of Sanji's disappearance deepens as Luffy learns that Big Mom's lackeys have caught up with him and the rest - and carry with them an invitation from Big Mom that simply can't be refused!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Truth Behind the Disappearance! Sanji Gets a Startling Invitation!

programme.title: Sanji's dire situation has become clear, but instead of rallying against Big Mom's crew, he submits to go along with them to bring an end to this situation. But being separated from one of his crew is more than Luffy is willing to tolerate!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To My Buds! Sanji's Farewell Note!

programme.title: There's only one key to finding out what happened to Sanji - and Luffy and the others make their way towards finding out more about their friend's disappearance, but on their way the indigenous fauna give them trouble!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Let's Go and Meet Master Cat Viper!

programme.title: Luffy hatches a plan to help Sanji, but he'll have to go alone to avoid an all-out war with Big Mom. Meanwhile, Kin'emon and Kanjuro finally arrive at Zou, unwittingly setting the stage for the Minks' thirst for revenge!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy's Decision! Sanji on the Brink of Quitting!

programme.title: The samurai have landed! And they make their way into the country of Zou unaware of the welcome they will receive by the Minks!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Volatile Situation! The Dog and the Cat and the Samurai!

programme.title: Revelations abound as the true nature of the Wano clan and their relationship with the Minks is revealed! Momonosuke's role is greater than any had imagined! But even more shocking - the visage of Raizo the Ninja!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Third One! Raizo of the Mist, the Ninja, Appears!

programme.title: The mysteries of ninjutsu enthrall the Straw Hats as Raizo, the implausible ninja, makes his true powers known! Meanwhile, a mysterious artifact points the way towards the end of the Grand Line!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Red Stone! A Guide to the One Piece!

programme.title: The mystery of the Ponegliffs is revealed - their true significance, and the story of their creation, leads closer to the Straw Hats than they might have imagined!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Secret of the Land of Wano! The Kozuki Family and the Ponegliffs!

programme.title: More mysteries of the Kozuki Clan are revealed - and the samurai propose an alliance to help topple Kaido! But Luffy's response will shock the crew... and force the young daimyo to take responsibility!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Vow Between Two Men! Luffy and Kozuki Momonosuke!

programme.title: Dogstorm and Cat Viper share their story of being on the journey with Oden and Roger but are interrupted by Nami who is concerned about the sea route. Meanwhile, Jack is plotting to bring down the Mokomo Dukedom again!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Legendary Journey! The Dog and the Cat and the Pirate King!

programme.title: The plans are set! The Straw Hats divide and conquer, one group heading to save Sanji, the others to the Land of Wano! But in the final moments before their departure, the tremendous elephant island begins to quake!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Nightmare Returns! The Invincible Jack's Fierce Attack!

programme.title: After being aggressively attacked by Jack's fleet, the monstrous Zunesha comes to life and beckons to those on its back! But can the Straw Hats understand its cry? And realize in time what the elephant island needs from them?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle to Defend Zou! Luffy and Zunesha!

programme.title: With the skirmish with Jack now over, the Straw Hats move on to trying to bandage the great elephant's wounds! But just as the whole island puts the plan into action, unseen danger lurks on horizon!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Save Zunesha! The Straw Hat's Rescue Operation!

programme.title: The Straw Hats and the others split up into four teams, each on different missions! Some from the Mink Tribe insist on leaving with Luffy's team! Meanwhile, Usopp makes a weapon for Nami that seems to work like magic!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Saying Goodbye and Descending from the Elephant! Setting Out to Take Back Sanji!

programme.title: Luffy's team sets out from Zou on their way to win back Sanji! But they didn't realize there is one more crewmember than they have bargained for!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To the Reverie! Princess Vivi and Princess Shirahoshi!

programme.title: Carrot stows away! And settles in with the Straw Hats as they make their way to rescue Sanji! Meanwhile, in the Sakura Kingdom, Dalton and Kureha are getting ready for the Reverie so as their former enemy in his newly-built kingdom
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To the Reverie! Rebecca and the Sakura Kingdom!

programme.title: News of the raid on the Revolutionary Army reaches Luffy! But that's the least of their worries as they face a storm and a sudden lack of provisions! Meanwhile, Emperor Kaido fumes with anger at the reckless generation of upstarts!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Kaido Returns! An Imminent Threat to the Worst Generation!

programme.title: Sneaking in to the Navy island facility to replenish their food supply, Luffy and the others risk being caught out in the open! Will their infamy make them easy to spot by the hotheaded Navy recruits around them?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Hungry Front! Luffy and the Navy Rookies!

programme.title: The jig is up as Luffy and the others make a daring dash to avoid the furious Navy! Can they escape without having to turn to fight - and after they've had a chance to raid the cabinets for food?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Implacable Three! A Big Chase After the Straw Hats!

programme.title: Making a mad dash for the Submerge with the food they stole, Luffy and the others have to get through some of the Navy's upstart soldiers! Grount, whose arm holds incredible power, summons his training to challenge Luffy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Devil's Fist! A Show Down! Luffy vs. Grount!

programme.title: The Straw Hats continue to suffer from blazing heat and a perilous food crisis! As the seas finally calm, fishing is their only hope! Meanwhile, Sanji arrives in Big Mom's territory and keeps his cool - until he sees his bride-to-be!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sanji's Homecoming! Into Big Mom's Territory!

programme.title: Luffy is in danger as the venomous fish poison courses through his body! With no antidotes on board, the Straw Hats must rely on a mysterious ship for help - a ship that bears a truly surprising crew!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: On the edge of life and death, Luffy's only hope rests with Sanji's siblings! But even though they refuse to share an antidote, they may be able to save Luffy's life yet, giving him enough energy to plunge right back into trouble.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Poison Crisis! Luffy and Reiju!

programme.title: Arriving on Cacao Island, Luffy and Chopper are in heaven as everything before their eyes is edible!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Totto Land! Emperor Big Mom Appears!

programme.title: The Straw Hats confront Pudding - the fiance of Sanji! But when they challenge her for Sanji's heart, her answer shocks them! Meanwhile, an ominous and mysterious message may spell doom for the Straw Hats.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Emperor's Daughter! Sanji's fiance - Pudding!

programme.title: The dangerous waters around the Whole Cake Island harbor terrifying creatures that pose a challenge for the Straw Hats! Meanwhile, Mama slips into a bout of her sickness and ravages her own land in search of a specific pastry!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Massive Attack! Mom's Hunger Pangs!

programme.title: Big Mom rampages through the Whole Cake Island in search for sweets - but when the kitchen can't prepare them fast enough, her own son steps in to curb the carnage, with deadly results.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Capital City Falls?! Big Mom and Jimbei!

programme.title: As the Straw Hats draw closer to the Whole Cake Island, Pedro shares his sordid past in Big Mom's territory - and hatches a plan to win back Sanji and take an item of great worth from the Emperor!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Emperor's Castle! Arriving at the Whole Cake Island!

programme.title: Brook and Pedro head out in a submersible to infiltrate Big Mom's stronghold! Meanwhile, Luffy, Nami, Chopper and Carrot head into the island chasing the image of Sanji, only to be distracted by the endless supply of sweets and a second Luffy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Mysterious Forest Full of Candies! Luffy vs. Luffy?!

programme.title: Lost in the bewildering woods and chasing after Sanji, Nami and the others find there's more than meets the eye in this upside down part of the Whole Cake Island! Meanwhile, Sanji confronts his brother!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Mom's Assassin! Luffy and the Seducing Woods!

programme.title: Luffy continues to move through the mysterious and dangerous woods, unaware of the danger that lurks in the trees! Meanwhile, Sanji confronts his father as the wounds of his childhood are laid bare!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Seafaring Kingdom! Germa's King Judge!

programme.title: Sanji faces off against his father in a duel! His powerful kicks aim at protecting his hands, but the Germa Family has more in store for him yet! Meanwhile, Luffy goes deeper into the Seducing Woods and falls for their powerful illusions!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle Between Father and Son! Judge vs. Sanji!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin scopes a jewelry museum where the billion-dollar gem Cleopatra's Tear is displayed. But Lupin can't get to it because the display case is secured by high-voltage electricity.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: No thief has ever succeeded in stealing the secret gem of Pompeii's nunnery; it's guarded by venomous snakes. Even Arsene Lupin gave up on it, since he hates snakes. But Lupin takes on the challenge. Will Lupin succeed? And what kind of secret gem is it?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Though the tycoon Steel had replaced all his bodily organs with artificial organs to live, he's told that he only has a week to live. There is only one way he could prolong his life, which is to receive a brain transplant and he wants Lupin's Brain.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Famous gourmand and field mice scientist Salmon Whitney is also known as being the chairman of a Canadian diamond mining operation. Lupin is after his diamonds, which will go on auction in Paris.
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Runs and the Pig Rolls

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Coaxed by Fujiko, Lupin decides to steal the diamond chandelier at the Kremlin Palace. He disguises himself as Zenigata and infiltrates the palace, but government police soldier Natasha captures him and throws him in the slammer.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: England's Lord Weather provokes Lupin with a bet, and dares him to steal Red Arrow away from him. Lupin takes the challenge as it's a matter of pride, but Jigen wants no part of it because he and Weather are gambling buddies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Miami Bank is on the verge of bankruptcy after its last customers closed their accounts. The bank manager Garlic devises a plan to revive the bank, and drums up news that his bank had been raided by Lupin; he also asks Lupin to really do it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Thief brothers Nanja-Monja have been in the business since the days of Arsne Lupin; they decide to induct Lupin as a tourist attraction for the Republic of Karchina. But first they abduct Fujiko.
programme.sub-title: Hair Breadth Rescue Operation for Fujiko

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko joins Lupin and gang who are camping and cooking Sukiyaki; people are hunting Fujiko, and gunfire is exchanged. Fujiko gets captured and Lupin's Sukiyaki meal gets ruined, but he finds an atomic bomb's detonator plug inside of the Sukiyaki bowl.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Genius prodigy boy Romanoff has ten doctorates from Russia's Public Academy; blustering that no greater than he exists, he challenges Lupin. Since Fujiko is involved, Lupin cannot back down; what will become of this challenge?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko is the model for Norway's famous sculptor Vingel's crystal mermaid statue; she believed when he said he would give it to her the day it was finished, but Vingel gets greedy and sells it to the mayor of the city of Bergen instead.
programme.sub-title: The Mermaid That Disappears in the Midnight Sun

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin tries to steal a bunch of diamonds from a diamond auction. But the auction auditorium is at the Marine Tower above a skyscraper, and there is only one transparent elevator to get there.
programme.sub-title: The Target is Five Hundred and Fifty Five Meters Away

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin heads to Mecca to steal Mohammed's treasure. But first he is confronted by Patra Lawrence, the grandaughter of the Lawrence of Arabia, who is the chief of Mecca's special police headquarters; how will Lupin steal the treasure now?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: As usual, Fujiko instigates Lupin and friends to go steal; this time their target is the Jovich Piano installed in a music hall built around it. There is no door large enough in the hall to carry the piano out.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the shipment of raw diamonds that arrived at a harbor in Nice; he sneaks into the storage in the middle of the night but Zenigata was on to him. Lupin escapes with the help of Jigen and Goemon, but Fujiko gets captured.
programme.sub-title: To Arrest Lupin, the Mission at Highway

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A month ago, president Gappolini of one of the world's top five trading companies, had died. Gappolini bequeathed a will saying that the heir to the company presidency will be the world's finest sharpshooter and Jigen is a target.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: It's said that immense sums of money confiscated from organized crime get transported to a Swiss bank by ICPO, once a year. Naturally, Lupin wants a piece of that action, so he steals the armed security vehicle along with Zenigata in it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The city of Grand Hexagon lies at the border of France and Spain; the city is designed with six sides. But at the center of the city is Raika Bank storing fifty tons of gold bullion; an alarm will go off if even one bullion is missing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Robot soldier Lamda flies above the sky of Tokyo, raids a jewelry store. Its creator, professor Oyamada's daughter Maki and Lupin say that it was just a show to demonstrate the inhumanity of robots.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd: Voyage to Danger
programme.desc: Someone sent orders to assassinate Lupin. Will he survive or die trying!?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #6 Dragon of Doom
programme.desc: On the bottom of the ocean, within the sunken Titanic, the golden dragon statue waits. When Lupin and the gang are hired to retrieve it, Goemon recognizes the dragon as one of his clan's treasures. Now, he's ready to fight his own friends to protect it!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #7 The Pursuit of Harimao's Treasure
programme.desc: To retrieve the Harimao's Treasure, Lupin and the gang must gather three lost statues. Lupin reluctantly partners with the aging "double-O" MI-6 agent Sir Archer and his granddaughter Diana to gather the statues.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #8 The Secret of Twilight Gemini
programme.desc: As Lupin's mentor Don Dolune lies on his deathbed, he hands the master thief a gift: the diamond named Twilight. But it's only half of the treasure-the other half of the Twilight can be found in Morocco

programme.title: Snowpiercer, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: After a failed global-warming experiment, a post-apocalyptic Ice Age has killed off nearly all life on the planet.

programme.title: Face/Off, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: As a result of a new medical technique, an agent is able to surgically take on the identical appearance of a criminal in order to take down his terrorist organization.

programme.title: Moon, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Sam Bell (Sam Rockwell) is nearing the completion of his 3-year-long contract with Lunar Industries, mining Earth's primary source of energy on the dark side of the moon.

programme.title: Attack the Block, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: ATTACK THE BLOCK is a fast, funny, frightening action adventure movie that pits a teen street gang against an invasion of savage alien monsters. It turns a crazy mix of tough street kids into a team of kick ass heroes.

programme.title: World War Z, (2013, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: World War Z is the fast-paced, pulse-pounding epic of the potential last days of the human race. Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt) is called in to help stop the pandemic that has spread around the world.

programme.title: Life, (2017, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: A team of scientists whose mission of discovery aboard the International Space Station turns into one of primal fear when they find a rapidly evolving life-form that caused extinction on Mars, and now threatens the crew and all life on Earth.

programme.title: The Running Man, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: A wrongly-convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a TV game show.

programme.title: World War Z, (2013, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: World War Z is the fast-paced, pulse-pounding epic of the potential last days of the human race. Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt) is called in to help stop the pandemic that has spread around the world.

programme.title: Angel and the Badman (2014), (1947, Action)
programme.desc: Quirt Evans, an all round bad guy, is nursed back to health and sought after by Penelope Worth, a Quaker girl. He eventually finds himself having to choose between his world and the world Penelope lives in.

programme.title: Lonesome Dove, (1989, Drama)
programme.desc: Texas Rangers and long-time ranching partners Gus McCrae and Woodrow Call meet their old friend Jake, and decide to strike out from their south Texas base and drive a cattle herd to Montana.

programme.title: Lonesome Dove, (1989, Drama)
programme.desc: McCrae and Wood's cattle drive faces deadly situations. Sheriff July Johnson heads to Texas, and former prostitute Lorena is abandoned by Jake and kidnapped by the psychotic Blue Duck.
programme.sub-title: Lonesome Dove: Part II - On The Trail

programme.title: Lonesome Dove, (1989, Drama)
programme.desc: Gus and July save Lorena from Blue Duck, but at a deadly cost. Jake runs with a bad crowd and pays the price. July accepts that his wife has left him and stays on at Clara's with his newborn son.
programme.sub-title: Lonesome Dove: Part III - The Plains

programme.title: Lonesome Dove, (1989, Drama)
programme.desc: The cattle drive reaches Nebraska, where Gus and Clara reunite. Drought and Indian attacks take their toll as the drive reaches Montana, and Gus is wounded. Call honors his best friend's request.

programme.title: Stagecoach, (1939, Drama)
programme.desc: Dallas is a woman with a past who has been driven out of town by the high-minded ladies of the community. Lucy Mallory is the wife of a cavalry officer stationed in Lordsburg, and she's determined to be with him.

programme.title: Red River, (1948, Drama)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Montgomery Clift and Walter Brennan give stellar performances in Howard Hawks' epic masterpiece as a self-made cattle baron (Wayne) and his adopted son (Clift) risk everything to drive their herd across the treacherous Chisholm Trail.

programme.title: True Grit, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: The cantankerous Rooster is hired by a headstrong young girl (Kim Darby) to find the man who murdered her father and fled with the family savings.

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers, (1959, Action)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: 30 Days of Night: Dark Days, (2010, Zombies)
programme.desc: Almost a year has passed since Barrow, Alaskas population was decimated by vampires. Stella, mourning her husbands murder, has been travelling the world trying to convince others that vampires exist.

programme.title: Only Lovers Left Alive, (2013, Vampires)
programme.desc: Driven by sensual photography, trance-like music, and droll humor, Jim Jarmuschs ONLY LOVERS LEFT ALIVE is a meditation on art, science, and the mysteries of everlasting love.

programme.title: The Other Boleyn Girl, (2008, Drama)
programme.desc: Two sisters, Anne and Mary, are driven by their ambitious family to seduce the king of England in order to advance their position in court. Rating: PG-13

programme.title: Lucky Number Slevin, (2006, Thriller)
programme.desc: A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses: The Rabbi and The Boss.

programme.title: Snatch, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: A diamond heist gone haywire launches gangsters, bookies, and a dog on a rollicking ride through the rugged world of bare-knuckle boxing in search of the missing stone. Critically acclaimed comedy from Guy Ritchie.

programme.title: Sahara, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Two thrill-seeking adventurers cross paths with a beautiful doctor and they find themselves on the ultimate hunt for a treasure that claims all who seek it.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels, (2000, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: When a devious mastermind embroils them in a plot to destroy individual privacy, the Angels, aided by their loyal sidekick Bosley (Bill Murray), set out to bring down the bad guys.

programme.desc: The "Angels", three investigative agents (Barrymore, Diaz and Liu) who work for the Charles Townsend Detective Agency, return for another high-octane series of adventures as they investigate the theft of a database of witness protection profiles.

programme.desc: Usagi and her friends go to see a show at the Dead Moon Circus. But Momo starts acting peculiar and leaves, causing Chibi-Usa to become worried.

programme.desc: Ami falls in love with a melody she finds online. She works on lyrics that match the melody and also goes to meet the composer, Toshiyuki Nishino.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Chibi-Usa go to the dentist to get their cavities treated. The dental clinic is actually a trap set up by Palla-Palla to find Pegasus.

programme.desc: Chibi-Usas school is having a sports day. However, one of its main events is jumping over the vaulting box, which Chibi-Usa is not very good at.

programme.desc: Chibi-Usa is curious to know why Pegasus is reluctant to tell her where he came from. When she confronts Pegasus with the question, he disappears.

programme.desc: Sailor Moon is left devastated after seeing Mamoru get abducted To make matters worse, Nehalennias action is starting to cause a time paradox.

programme.desc: Sailor Chibi Moon and Sailor Saturn make it to Nehalennias palace, where Mamoru is being held prisoner. The two Guardians are unable to free him.

programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: Robotech
programme.desc: The Regess devises a plan to grow a humanoid simulagent to infiltrate the resistance and transmit vital intelligence to the Invid; Rand and Rook discover the spy among the wreckage of a recent battle and welcome her to the group.

programme.title: Robotech
programme.desc: In their attempt to bypass an avalanche, Scott and his group learn about a map that provides a secret route; Lancer approaches a local mayor for help raising money to buy the map and encounters Carla, a musician with ties to his past.

programme.title: Steins;Gate

programme.desc: Okabe and Makise find themselves faced with the unthinkable situation of saying goodbye before their time together really even began, and struggle to admit their true feelings before it's too late.

programme.title: Steins;Gate
programme.desc: Okabe has one final chance to travel back in time, set everything right, and save the girl he never even got to love; his mission is vital, but it may mean the end for the mad scientist.

programme.title: Cop Craft

programme.title: Dose Dupla

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: O Despertar
programme.desc: Selene, que descobre que tem um filha adolescente chamada Lycan, uma hbrida de vampiro e humano. Juntas, elas devem impedir a empresa biotecnolgica Antigen de produzir as criaturas conhecidas como SuperLycans.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Bem-Vindo a Raccoon City
programme.desc: Esta histria de origem, ambientada em 1998, explora os segredos da misteriosa Manso Spencer e da malfadada Raccoon City.

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: Callum Lynch explora as memrias de seu ancestral Aguilar Nerha e se torna um Mestre Assassino para enfrentar a sociedade secreta dos Templrios.

programme.title: Sem Perdo
programme.desc: Victor trabalha com um grande criminoso. Um dia, ele encontra Beatrice, vtima de um crime, que pede a ajuda de Victor para ajud-la em sua vingana. Para convenc-lo a cooperar, ela o chantageira com provas de um assassinato que Victor cometeu.

programme.title: Wasabi
programme.desc: Um duro detetive francs, chamado ao Japo para o funeral da esposa que o deixou h muito tempo atrs, descobre que tem uma filha adolescente cuja vida corre perigo, estando na mira da Yakuza.

programme.title: Perseguio Mortal
programme.desc: O ladro realiza o roubo de sua vida quando rouba o traficante psictico, Temple. O plano corre bem at que o ladro descobre um clandestino em seu carro de fuga: a esposa grvida de Temple, Mia.

programme.title: Txi 2 - Mais Velocidade nas Ruas
programme.desc: O inspetor de polcia Emilien e seu amigo motorista de txi Daniel esto de volta, desta vez caando um grupo de japoneses.

programme.title: Inferno na Montanha
programme.desc: Um pai e um filho tentam salvar os habitantes de uma pequena cidade de um desastre natural e do colapso de um tnel recm-construdo.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite
programme.desc: Selene, uma guerreira vampira, est imersa em um conflito entre vampiros e lobisomens, enquanto se apaixona por Michael, um humano que procurado por lobisomens por razes desconhecidas.

programme.title: Possuda
programme.desc: Depois de descobrir que sua irm mais velha foi mordida por um lobisomem, a adolescente Brigitte embarca em uma misso desesperada para encontrar uma maneira de reverter o feitio e salv-la antes que seja tarde demais.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais
programme.desc: Um sdico serial killer sequestra aqueles que so moralmente rebeldes e os fora a fazer escolhas impossveis em um jogo de sobrevivncia assustador.

programme.title: Jessabelle: O Passado Nunca Morre
programme.desc: Uma jovem forada a voltar para a casa de seu pai, na Louisiana, quando um acidente de trnsito a deixa incapacitada, sem poder usar as pernas.

programme.title: A Casa Silenciosa
programme.desc: Uma jovem fica presa dentro do refgio beira do lago de sua famlia e se torna incapaz de entrar em contato com o mundo exterior enquanto foras sobrenaturais assombram a casa com energias e consequncias misteriosas.

programme.title: Cemitrio Maldito
programme.desc: Para a maioria das famlia, mudar-se um novo comeo. Mas para os Creeds, ele pode ser o comeo do fim.

programme.title: O Grito
programme.desc: Karen uma enfermeira americana que vive em Tquio e exposta a uma misteriosa maldio sobrenatural: um esprito vingativo que possui uma pessoa com uma raiva poderosa antes de reivindicar sua vida e se espalhar para outra vtima.

programme.title: Depois da escurido
programme.desc: Com o Sol se apagando, uma famlia norte-americana se rene para passar os ltimos dias juntos, espera do fim do mundo. Enquanto os momentos de tenso vo passando, velhas mgoas e segredos vm tona.

programme.title: Sem Rastros
programme.desc: Wendy e Paul descobrem que sua filha Taylor desapareceu sem deixar vestgios durante uma viagem em famlia. Quando a polcia no tem nenhuma pista, os dois no param por nada para encontr-la.

programme.title: Assassinatos em Boston
programme.desc: Matt Sorenson um ex-boxeador que tambm policial. Ele tenta elucidar a brutal morte de seu irmo mais novo, Michael, e para isto precisa se infiltrar em algo desconhecido para ele: a prtica do sadomasoquismo.

programme.title: Assassinato em Sparrow Creek
programme.desc: Um antigo policial que agora trabalha como miliciano investiga um tiroteio que aconteceu em seu bairro. Porm, tudo fica mais complicado quando ele descobre que algum da sua prpria milcia pode ter sido o responsvel.

programme.title: Xeque-Mate
programme.desc: Um caso de identidade equivocada coloca Slevin no meio de uma guerra sendo tramada por dois dos chefes do crime mais rivais da cidade. Sob vigilncia constante do detetive Brikowski e do assassino Goodkat, ele deve peg-los antes que eles o peguem.

programme.title: Apex
programme.desc: Cinco caadores de elite so pagos para caar um homem em uma ilha deserta. Mas quando a presa comea a reagir, os papis de caador e presa trocam de lado

programme.title: Misso: Pandora
programme.desc: Aps receber um pedido de socorro de uma embarcao, a Fora Espacial Americana envia uma nave de resgate at Pandora, uma das luas de Saturno. Mas ao tentarem pousar, a tripulao descobre que o local habitado por uma raa altamente evoluda.

programme.title: Assassinos do Espao
programme.desc: Em um dia normal, cinco amigos saem para beber noite, mas, coisas estranhas comeam a acontecer. As luzes apagam, os telefones no funcionam e uma invaso de naves aliengenas escurece o cu.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Bem-Vindo a Raccoon City
programme.desc: Esta histria de origem, ambientada em 1998, explora os segredos da misteriosa Manso Spencer e da malfadada Raccoon City.

programme.title: Hava em Chamas
programme.desc: Quando um supervulco entra em erupo no Hava, uma equipe de especialistas precisa correr contra o tempo para salvar a vida da populao antes que ela seja atingida pela lava fumegante.

programme.title: Vulco - O Apocalipse
programme.desc: Quando um ex-comandante das Operaes Especiais visita Pompia, sua esposa e filha ficam presas no Monte. O Vesvio entra em erupo com fora macia.

programme.title: Equilibrium
programme.desc: Num futuro incerto, a raa humana foi quase totalmente devastada da Terra. Para salvar o mundo, os governantes decidiram criar uma droga capaz de inibir o sentimento humano e garantir a paz para sempre.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: A Evoluo
programme.desc: A saga continua mostrando o incio da antiga disputa entre as duas triboso os Vampiros y Lycans, enquanto a bela herona vampira Selene descobre que foi trada pela sua prpria raa e agora precisa buscar vingana.

programme.title: Sem Perdo
programme.desc: Victor trabalha com um grande criminoso. Um dia, ele encontra Beatrice, vtima de um crime, que pede a ajuda de Victor para ajud-la em sua vingana. Para convenc-lo a cooperar, ela o chantageira com provas de um assassinato que Victor cometeu.

programme.title: Sombra
programme.desc: Esta a histria de uma me que, apesar de todos os obstculos que encontra, no aceita desistir de lutar para encontrar o seu filho de 11 anos, que desapareceu de forma misteriosa.

programme.title: Instinto Selvagem 2
programme.desc: A romancista Catherine est novamente em apuros com a lei e a Scotland Yard nomeia o psiquiatra Dr. Michael Glass para avali-la. No entanto, como o detetive Nick Curran antes dele, Glass fica fascinado por Tramell e atrado para um jogo sedutor.

programme.title: Giallo: Refens do Medo
programme.desc: Um psicopata aterroriza a cidade, sequestrando garotas lindas para lhes tirar a beleza. O inspetor Enzo Avolfi encarregado desse caso quando uma modelo desaparece no caminho da casa de sua irm. Agora, ele deve correr contra o tempo para encontr-la.

programme.title: O Franco-Atirador
programme.desc: Depois de uma longa carreira como matador de aluguel, Martin Terrier pretende se aposentar e passar o resto da vida ao lado de sua amada. Mas ele descobre que est sendo trado por pessoas de sua confiana!

programme.title: Juiz Arqueiro
programme.desc: Um homem, que encarregado de resolver algumas discuptas entre academinas rivais de artes marciais fica dividido. Ele no sabe se escolhe cumprir o dever do que lhe foi delegado ou se vinga a horna de sua famlia.

programme.title: Honra
programme.desc: Dois amigos do mesmo bairro que seguiram caminhos diferentes devem decidir se ficaro do lado da lei ou das gangues quando novos confrontos comearem.

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: Co de briga

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E7

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E10

programme.title: Com Kenny trabalhando a noite toda antes do dia do torneio, Kevin, do White Tigers, tenta esgueirar-se para onde esto dormindo, roubar e / ou destruir o Driger de Ray.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E11

programme.title: Ray deixa os BladeBreakers e viaja para as montanhas para tentar recuperar Driger. Mariah o encontra, bate em batalha, confronta-o com sua estupidez e pede que ele volte para os Tigres Brancos.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E12

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E19

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E20

programme.title: Inuyasha afastado de seus amigos quando enganado por informaes falsas de que Kikyo ainda est viva. Enquanto isso, Agome e os outros esto em uma certa cidade do castelo e so capturados.

programme.title: Masterminds (2016)
programme.desc: An armored-car driver (Zach Galifianakis) helps a flirty co-worker (Kristen Wiig) and her friends pull off a heist, then finds himself holding the bag after they double-cross him.

programme.title: Uncommon Valor (1983)

programme.desc: Sigrid thinks shes met the perfect match in Christian, but theres one catch: he lives with a man who acts like his pet dog. Trying to be open-minded, she continues the relationship but soon notices an insidious undertone to Christian.

programme.title: Ride (2024)

programme.sub-title: JFK Revisited: Through the Looking Glass (2021)
